## [Folder](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder)

### Methods

|                                                                                             Method                                                                                              |                                         Return type                                         |                                                                                                           Brief description                                                                                                           |
|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| [addEditor(emailAddress)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder#addEditor(String))                                                                                   | [Folder](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder)                  | Adds the given user to the list of editors for the [Folder](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder).                                                                                                        |
| [addEditor(user)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder#addEditor(User))                                                                                             | [Folder](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder)                  | Adds the given user to the list of editors for the [Folder](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder).                                                                                                        |
| [addEditors(emailAddresses)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder#addEditors(String))                                                                               | [Folder](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder)                  | Adds the given array of users to the list of editors for the [Folder](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder).                                                                                              |
| [addViewer(emailAddress)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder#addViewer(String))                                                                                   | [Folder](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder)                  | Adds the given user to the list of viewers for the [Folder](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder).                                                                                                        |
| [addViewer(user)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder#addViewer(User))                                                                                             | [Folder](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder)                  | Adds the given user to the list of viewers for the [Folder](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder).                                                                                                        |
| [addViewers(emailAddresses)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder#addViewers(String))                                                                               | [Folder](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder)                  | Adds the given array of users to the list of viewers for the [Folder](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder).                                                                                              |
| [createFile(blob)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder#createFile(BlobSource))                                                                                     | [File](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/file)                      | Creates a file in the current folder from a given `Blob` of arbitrary data.                                                                                                                                                           |
| [createFile(name, content)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder#createFile(String,String))                                                                         | [File](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/file)                      | Creates a text file in the current folder with the given name and contents.                                                                                                                                                           |
| [createFile(name, content, mimeType)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder#createFile(String,String,String))                                                        | [File](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/file)                      | Creates a file in the current folder with the given name, contents, and MIME type.                                                                                                                                                    |
| [createFolder(name)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder#createFolder(String))                                                                                     | [Folder](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder)                  | Creates a folder in the current folder with the given name.                                                                                                                                                                           |
| [createShortcut(targetId)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder#createShortcut(String))                                                                             | [File](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/file)                      | Creates a shortcut to the provided Drive item ID, and returns it.                                                                                                                                                                     |
| [createShortcutForTargetIdAndResourceKey(targetId, targetResourceKey)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder#createShortcutForTargetIdAndResourceKey(String,String)) | [File](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/file)                      | Creates a shortcut to the provided Drive item ID and resource key, and returns it.                                                                                                                                                    |
| [getAccess(email)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder#getAccess(String))                                                                                          | [Permission](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/permission)          | Gets the permission granted to a specific user.                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| [getAccess(user)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder#getAccess(User))                                                                                             | [Permission](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/permission)          | Gets the permission granted to a specific user.                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| [getDateCreated()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder#getDateCreated())                                                                                           | `Date`                                                                                      | Gets the date the [Folder](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder) was created.                                                                                                                             |
| [getDescription()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder#getDescription())                                                                                           | `String`                                                                                    | Gets the description for the [Folder](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder).                                                                                                                              |
| [getEditors()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder#getEditors())                                                                                                   | [User[]](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/user)                    | Gets the list of editors for this [Folder](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder).                                                                                                                         |
| [getFiles()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder#getFiles())                                                                                                       | [FileIterator](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/file-iterator)     | Gets a collection of all files that are children of the current folder.                                                                                                                                                               |
| [getFilesByName(name)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder#getFilesByName(String))                                                                                 | [FileIterator](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/file-iterator)     | Gets a collection of all files that are children of the current folder and have the given name.                                                                                                                                       |
| [getFilesByType(mimeType)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder#getFilesByType(String))                                                                             | [FileIterator](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/file-iterator)     | Gets a collection of all files that are children of the current folder and have the given MIME type.                                                                                                                                  |
| [getFolders()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder#getFolders())                                                                                                   | [FolderIterator](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder-iterator) | Gets a collection of all folders that are children of the current folder.                                                                                                                                                             |
| [getFoldersByName(name)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder#getFoldersByName(String))                                                                             | [FolderIterator](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder-iterator) | Gets a collection of all folders that are children of the current folder and have the given name.                                                                                                                                     |
| [getId()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder#getId())                                                                                                             | `String`                                                                                    | Gets the ID of the [Folder](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder).                                                                                                                                        |
| [getLastUpdated()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder#getLastUpdated())                                                                                           | `Date`                                                                                      | Gets the date the [Folder](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder) was last updated.                                                                                                                        |
| [getName()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder#getName())                                                                                                         | `String`                                                                                    | Gets the name of the [Folder](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder).                                                                                                                                      |
| [getOwner()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder#getOwner())                                                                                                       | [User](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/user)                      | Gets the owner of this [Folder](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder).                                                                                                                                    |
| [getParents()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder#getParents())                                                                                                   | [FolderIterator](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder-iterator) | Gets a collection of folders that are immediate parents of the [Folder](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder).                                                                                            |
| [getResourceKey()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder#getResourceKey())                                                                                           | `String`                                                                                    | Gets the resource key of the [Folder](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder) that is required to access items that have been shared using a link.                                                          |
| [getSecurityUpdateEligible()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder#getSecurityUpdateEligible())                                                                     | `Boolean`                                                                                   | Gets whether this [Folder](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder) is eligible to apply the security update that requires a resource key for access when it's shared using a link.                          |
| [getSecurityUpdateEnabled()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder#getSecurityUpdateEnabled())                                                                       | `Boolean`                                                                                   | Gets whether this [Folder](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder) requires a resource key for access when it's shared using a link.                                                                        |
| [getSharingAccess()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder#getSharingAccess())                                                                                       | [Access](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/access)                  | Gets which class of users can access the [Folder](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder), besides any individual users who have been explicitly given access.                                              |
| [getSharingPermission()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder#getSharingPermission())                                                                               | [Permission](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/permission)          | Gets the permission granted to those users who can access the [Folder](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder), besides any individual users who have been explicitly given access.                         |
| [getSize()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder#getSize())                                                                                                         | `Integer`                                                                                   | Gets the number of bytes used to store the [Folder](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder) in Drive.                                                                                                       |
| [getUrl()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder#getUrl())                                                                                                           | `String`                                                                                    | Gets the URL that can be used to open the [Folder](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder) in a Google App like Drive or Docs.                                                                              |
| [getViewers()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder#getViewers())                                                                                                   | [User[]](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/user)                    | Gets the list of viewers and commenters for this [Folder](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder).                                                                                                          |
| [isShareableByEditors()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder#isShareableByEditors())                                                                               | `Boolean`                                                                                   | Determines whether users with edit permissions to the [Folder](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder) are allowed to share with other users or change the permissions.                                     |
| [isStarred()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder#isStarred())                                                                                                     | `Boolean`                                                                                   | Determines whether the [Folder](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder) has been starred in the user's Drive.                                                                                               |
| [isTrashed()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder#isTrashed())                                                                                                     | `Boolean`                                                                                   | Determines whether the [Folder](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder) is in the trash of the user's Drive.                                                                                                |
| [moveTo(destination)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder#moveTo(Folder))                                                                                          | [Folder](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder)                  | Moves this item to the provided destination folder.                                                                                                                                                                                   |
| [removeEditor(emailAddress)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder#removeEditor(String))                                                                             | [Folder](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder)                  | Removes the given user from the list of editors for the [Folder](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder).                                                                                                   |
| [removeEditor(user)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder#removeEditor(User))                                                                                       | [Folder](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder)                  | Removes the given user from the list of editors for the [Folder](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder).                                                                                                   |
| [removeViewer(emailAddress)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder#removeViewer(String))                                                                             | [Folder](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder)                  | Removes the given user from the list of viewers and commenters for the [Folder](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder).                                                                                    |
| [removeViewer(user)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder#removeViewer(User))                                                                                       | [Folder](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder)                  | Removes the given user from the list of viewers and commenters for the [Folder](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder).                                                                                    |
| [revokePermissions(emailAddress)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder#revokePermissions(String))                                                                   | [Folder](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder)                  | Revokes the access to the [Folder](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder) granted to the given user.                                                                                                       |
| [revokePermissions(user)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder#revokePermissions(User))                                                                             | [Folder](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder)                  | Revokes the access to the [Folder](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder) granted to the given user.                                                                                                       |
| [searchFiles(params)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder#searchFiles(String))                                                                                     | [FileIterator](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/file-iterator)     | Gets a collection of all files that are children of the current folder and match the given search criteria.                                                                                                                           |
| [searchFolders(params)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder#searchFolders(String))                                                                                 | [FolderIterator](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder-iterator) | Gets a collection of all folders that are children of the current folder and match the given search criteria.                                                                                                                         |
| [setDescription(description)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder#setDescription(String))                                                                          | [Folder](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder)                  | Sets the description for the [Folder](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder).                                                                                                                              |
| [setName(name)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder#setName(String))                                                                                               | [Folder](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder)                  | Sets the name of the [Folder](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder).                                                                                                                                      |
| [setOwner(emailAddress)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder#setOwner(String))                                                                                     | [Folder](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder)                  | Changes the owner of the [Folder](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder).                                                                                                                                  |
| [setOwner(user)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder#setOwner(User))                                                                                               | [Folder](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder)                  | Changes the owner of the [Folder](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder).                                                                                                                                  |
| [setSecurityUpdateEnabled(enabled)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder#setSecurityUpdateEnabled(Boolean))                                                         | [Folder](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder)                  | Sets whether the [Folder](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder) requires a resource key for access when it's shared using a link.                                                                         |
| [setShareableByEditors(shareable)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder#setShareableByEditors(Boolean))                                                             | [Folder](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder)                  | Sets whether users with edit permissions to the [Folder](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder) are allowed to share with other users or change the permissions.                                           |
| [setSharing(accessType, permissionType)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder#setSharing(Access,Permission))                                                        | [Folder](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder)                  | Sets which class of users can access the [Folder](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder) and what permissions those users are granted, besides any individual users who have been explicitly given access. |
| [setStarred(starred)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder#setStarred(Boolean))                                                                                     | [Folder](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder)                  | Sets whether the [Folder](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder) is starred in the user's Drive.                                                                                                           |
| [setTrashed(trashed)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder#setTrashed(Boolean))                                                                                     | [Folder](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder)                  | Sets whether the [Folder](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/drive/folder) is in the trash of the user's Drive.                                                                                                      |
